title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
production_companies: Plan B Entertainment,Tim Burton Productions,Tommy Harper Productions,Domain Entertainment
cast: Michael Keaton,Winona Ryder,Catherine O'Hara,Jenna Ortega,Justin Theroux
overview: The ghost with the most is back.

title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
cast: Chris Pine,Michelle Rodriguez,Justice Smith,Sophia Lillis,Hugh Grant
overview: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers undertake an epic heist to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
cast: Tom Cruise,Jeremy Renner,Simon Pegg,Rebecca Ferguson,Ving Rhames
overview: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet—eradicating 'The Syndicate', an International and highly-skilled rogue organization committed to destroying the IMF.

title: Subservience
cast: Megan Fox,Michele Morrone,Madeline Zima,Matilda Firth,Andrew Whipp
overview: With his wife out sick, a struggling father brings home a lifelike AI, only to have his self-aware new help want everything her new family has to offer... Like the affection of her owner and she'll kill to get it.

title: Demon City
cast: Toma Ikuta,Masahiro Higashide,Miou Tanaka,Ami Touma,Taro Suruga
overview: Framed for his family's murder and left for dead, an ex-hitman will stop at nothing to exact revenge on the masked "demons" who have taken over his city.

title: Pacific Rim
cast: Charlie Hunnam,Rinko Kikuchi,Idris Elba,Max Martini,Clifton Collins Jr.
overview: Using massive piloted robots to combat the alien threat, earth's survivors take the fight to the invading alien force lurking in the depths of the Pacific Ocean. Nearly defenseless in the face of the relentless enemy, the forces of mankind have no choice but to turn to two unlikely heroes who now stand as earth's final hope against the mounting apocalypse.

title: Through My Window
cast: Clara Galle,Julio Peña,Guillermo Lasheras,Natalia Azahara,Hugo Arbues
overview: Raquel's longtime crush on her next-door neighbor turns into something more when he starts developing feelings for her, despite his family's objections.

title: Last Bullet
cast: Alban Lenoir,Stéfi Celma,Nicolas Duvauchelle,Gérard Lanvin,Pascale Arbillot
overview: Car genius Lino returns to conclude his vendetta against Areski and the corrupt commander who ruined their lives in this turbo-charged trilogy finale.

title: Despicable Me
cast: Steve Carell,Jason Segel,Miranda Cosgrove,Elsie Fisher,Dana Gaier
overview: Villainous Gru lives up to his reputation as a despicable, deplorable and downright unlikable guy when he hatches a plan to steal the moon from the sky. But he has a tough time staying on task after three orphans land in his care.

title: Rush Hour
production_companies: New Line Cinema,Arthur Sarkissian Productions,Roger Birnbaum Productions
cast: Jackie Chan,Chris Tucker,Tom Wilkinson,Philip Baker Hall,Elizabeth Peña
overview: When Hong Kong Inspector Lee is summoned to Los Angeles to investigate a kidnapping, the FBI doesn't want any outside help and assigns cocky LAPD Detective James Carter to distract Lee from the case. Not content to watch the action from the sidelines, Lee and Carter form an unlikely partnership and investigate the case themselves.

title: Songs from the Hole
cast: James "JJ'88" Jacobs,Indigo Mateo,richie reseda
overview: Sentenced to life in prison at 15, musician JJ'88 finds hope by writing songs during solitary confinement in this award-winning documentary visual album.

title: The Life List
cast: Sofia Carson,Kyle Allen,Sebastian de Souza,Connie Britton,José Zúñiga
overview: When her mother sends her on a quest to complete a teenage bucket list, a young woman uncovers family secrets, finds romance — and rediscovers herself.

title: The Karate Kid
production_companies: Jerry Weintraub Productions,Columbia Pictures,Overbrook Entertainment,China Film Group Corporation,Emperor Motion Pictures
cast: Jaden Smith,Jackie Chan,Taraji P. Henson,Wenwen Han,Zac Wang
overview: 12-year-old Dre Parker could've been the most popular kid in Detroit, but his mother's latest career move has landed him in China. Dre immediately falls for his classmate Mei Ying but the cultural differences make such a friendship impossible. Even worse, Dre's feelings make him an enemy of the class bully, Cheng. With no friends in a strange land, Dre has nowhere to turn but maintenance man Mr. Han, who is a kung fu master. As Han teaches Dre that kung fu is not about punches and parries, but maturity and calm, Dre realizes that facing down the bullies will be the fight of his life.

title: I'm Still a Superstar
cast: Yurena,Margarita Seisdedos,Loly Alvarez,Leonardo Dantés,Paco Porras
overview: This documentary explores Yurena's meteoric rise to fame as Tamara, the media frenzy she faced in the 2000s and the present-day lives of her TV rivals.

title: The Departed
production_companies: Warner Bros. Pictures,Plan B Entertainment,Initial Entertainment Group,Vertigo Entertainment,Media Asia Films
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio,Matt Damon,Jack Nicholson,Mark Wahlberg,Martin Sheen
overview: To take down South Boston's Irish Mafia, the police send in one of their own to infiltrate the underworld, not realizing the syndicate has done likewise. While an undercover cop curries favor with the mob kingpin, a career criminal rises through the police ranks. But both sides soon discover there's a mole among them.

title: Mission: Impossible III
cast: Tom Cruise,Philip Seymour Hoffman,Ving Rhames,Billy Crudup,Michelle Monaghan
overview: Retired from active duty, and training recruits for the Impossible Mission Force, agent Ethan Hunt faces the toughest foe of his career: Owen Davian, an international broker of arms and information, who's as cunning as he is ruthless. Davian emerges to threaten Hunt and all that he holds dear – including the woman Hunt loves.

title: Mission: Impossible II
cast: Tom Cruise,Dougray Scott,Thandiwe Newton,Ving Rhames,Richard Roxburgh
overview: With computer genius Luther Stickell at his side and a beautiful thief on his mind, agent Ethan Hunt races across Australia and Spain to stop a former IMF agent from unleashing a genetically engineered biological weapon called Chimera. This mission, should Hunt choose to accept it, plunges him into the center of an international crisis of terrifying magnitude.

title: Talk to Me
production_companies: Causeway Films,Screen Australia,South Australian Film Corporation,Bankside Films,Head Gear Films,Metrol Technology
cast: Sophie Wilde,Alexandra Jensen,Joe Bird,Otis Dhanji,Miranda Otto
overview: When a group of friends discover how to conjure spirits using an embalmed hand, they become hooked on the new thrill, until one of them goes too far and unleashes terrifying supernatural forces.

title: Miller's Girl
cast: Jenna Ortega,Martin Freeman,Bashir Salahuddin,Gideon Adlon,Dagmara Dominczyk
overview: A talented young writer embarks on a creative odyssey when her teacher assigns a project that entangles them both.

title: Purple Hearts
cast: Sofia Carson,Nicholas Galitzine,John Harlan Kim,Chosen Jacobs,Anthony Ippolito
overview: An aspiring musician agrees to a marriage of convenience with a soon-to-deploy Marine, but a tragedy soon turns their fake relationship all too real.

title: Back in Action
cast: Jamie Foxx,Cameron Diaz,McKenna Roberts,Rylan Jackson,Kyle Chandler
overview: Fifteen years after vanishing from the CIA to start a family, elite spies Matt and Emily jump back into the world of espionage when their cover is blown.

title: Carry-On
cast: Taron Egerton,Jason Bateman,Sofia Carson,Danielle Deadwyler,Theo Rossi
overview: An airport security officer races to outsmart a mysterious traveler forcing him to let a dangerous item slip onto a Christmas Eve flight.

title: Bad Influence
production_companies: N&L Films,Wattpad WEBTOON Studios,Nadie es Perfecto,Imperfect Films
cast: Alberto Olmo,Eléa Rochera,Enrique Arce,Mirela Balić,Farid Bechara
overview: An ex-con gets a fresh start when hired to protect a wealthy heiress from a stalker — but their chemistry is hard to resist as they grow closer.

title: Penguins of Madagascar
cast: Tom McGrath,Chris Miller,Christopher Knights,Conrad Vernon,John Malkovich
overview: Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private join forces with undercover organization The North Wind to stop the villainous Dr. Octavius Brine from destroying the world as we know it.

title: Miraculous: Ladybug & Cat Noir, The Movie
production_companies: The Awakening Production,SND,Fantawild,Zag Animation Studios,ON Animation Studios
cast: Anouck Hautbois,Benjamin Bollen,Fanny Bloc,Alexandre N'Guyen,Antoine Tomé
overview: After a guardian of magical jewels turns an awkward girl and a popular boy into superheroes, they can never reveal their identities — even to each other.

title: My Hero Academia: You're Next
production_companies: BONES,TOHO,Yomiuri Telecasting Corporation,Shueisha,Nippon Television Network Corporation,dentsu,Sony Music Entertainment (Japan),movic
cast: Daiki Yamashita,Meru Nukumi,Mamoru Miyano,Kenta Miyake,Nobuhiko Okamoto
overview: In a society devastated by the effects of an all-out war between heroes and villains, a mysterious giant fortress suddenly appears, engulfing towns and people one after another. Then, a man reminiscent of All Might, the 'symbol of peace', stands in front of Izuku and his friends...

title: Drawing Closer
cast: Ren Nagase,Natsuki Deguchi,Mayuu Yokota,Fumino Kimura,Nene Otsuka
overview: With only a year left to live, 17-year-old Akito finds new meaning in life by bringing joy to a terminally ill girl who has just six months remaining.

title: Sing: Thriller
cast: Matthew McConaughey,Tori Kelly,Nick Kroll,Scarlett Johansson,Taron Egerton
overview: Buster Moon dreams up a star-studded spectacle set to Michael Jackson's "Thriller" in this animated short featuring characters from the hit "Sing" films.

title: Polar
cast: Mads Mikkelsen,Vanessa Hudgens,Katheryn Winnick,Inga Cadranel,Fei Ren
overview: When a retiring assassin realizes that he is the target of a hit, he winds up back in the game going head to head with a gang of younger, ruthless killers.

title: After We Collided
cast: Josephine Langford,Hero Fiennes Tiffin,Dylan Sprouse,Louise Lombard,Charlie Weber
overview: Tessa finds herself struggling with her complicated relationship with Hardin; she faces a dilemma that could change their lives forever.

title: Despicable Me 2
cast: Steve Carell,Kristen Wiig,Benjamin Bratt,Miranda Cosgrove,Russell Brand
overview: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.

title: Den of Thieves 2: Pantera
production_companies: Diamond Film Productions,G-BASE,Tucker Tooley Entertainment,Lionsgate,Entertainment One Features
cast: Gerard Butler,O'Shea Jackson Jr.,Evin Ahmad,Salvatore Esposito,Meadow Williams
overview: Big Nick is back on the hunt in Europe and closing in on Donnie, who is embroiled in the treacherous and unpredictable world of diamond thieves and the infamous Panther mafia, as they plot a massive heist of the world's largest diamond exchange.

title: After We Fell
cast: Josephine Langford,Hero Fiennes Tiffin,Louise Lombard,Chance Perdomo,Rob Estes
overview: Just as Tessa's life begins to become unglued, nothing is what she thought it would be. Not her friends nor her family. The only person that she should be able to rely on is Hardin, who is furious when he discovers the massive secret that she's been keeping. Before Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes because of revelations about her family.

title: The Electric State
cast: Millie Bobby Brown,Chris Pratt,Ke Huy Quan,Jason Alexander,Woody Norman
overview: An orphaned teen hits the road with a mysterious robot to find her long-lost brother, teaming up with a smuggler and his wisecracking sidekick.

title: Megamind
cast: Will Ferrell,Brad Pitt,Tina Fey,Jonah Hill,David Cross
overview: After Megamind, a highly intelligent alien supervillain, defeats his long-time nemesis Metro Man, Megamind creates a new hero to fight, but must act to save the city when his "creation" becomes an even worse villain than he was.

title: V for Vendetta
production_companies: Virtual Studios,Anarchos Productions,Silver Pictures,Fünfte Babelsberg Film,Warner Bros. Productions,DC Vertigo
cast: Natalie Portman,Hugo Weaving,Stephen Rea,Stephen Fry,John Hurt
overview: In a world in which Great Britain has become a fascist state, a masked vigilante known only as “V” conducts guerrilla warfare against the oppressive British government. When V rescues a young woman from the secret police, he finds in her an ally with whom he can continue his fight to free the people of Britain.

title: Paddington in Peru
cast: Ben Whishaw,Hugh Bonneville,Emily Mortimer,Samuel Joslin,Madeleine Harris
overview: Paddington travels to Peru to visit his beloved Aunt Lucy, who now resides at the Home for Retired Bears. With the Brown Family in tow, a thrilling adventure ensues when a mystery plunges them into an unexpected journey through the Amazon rainforest and up to the mountain peaks of Peru.

title: 20th Century Girl
cast: Kim You-jung,Byeon Woo-seok,Park Jung-woo,Roh Yoon-seo,Kim Sung-kyung
overview: In 1999, a teen girl keeps close tabs on a boy in school on behalf of her deeply smitten best friend – then she gets swept up in a love story of her own.

title: Jewel Thief - The Heist Begins
cast: Saif Ali Khan,Jaideep Ahlawat,Nikita Dutta,Kunal Kapoor,Kulbhushan Kharbanda
overview: In this high-octane battle of wits and wills, ingenious con artist Rehan devises a diamond heist while trying to outsmart Rajan, his sadistic adversary.

title: Godzilla Minus One
cast: Ryunosuke Kamiki,Minami Hamabe,Yuki Yamada,Munetaka Aoki,Hidetaka Yoshioka
overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.

title: Now You See Me
production_companies: Summit Entertainment,K/O Paper Products,SOIXAN7E QUIN5E,See Me Louisiana
cast: Mark Ruffalo,Jesse Eisenberg,Woody Harrelson,Isla Fisher,Dave Franco
overview: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.

title: The Gray Man
cast: Ryan Gosling,Chris Evans,Ana de Armas,Billy Bob Thornton,Jessica Henwick
overview: When a shadowy CIA agent uncovers damning agency secrets, he's hunted across the globe by a sociopathic rogue operative who's put a bounty on his head.
